Edited September 3, 2015 by ExplorerKlatt
BDArmory's last major update released working tracking radar. You now have to lock targets with the radar to attack.
OK craft files are up download in the first post.
very interesting. Can you please explain that last picture for me?

With the new parts added in BDA .9, craft can be separated and still use the targeting abilities of the radar. In my picture the craft near the VAB has the tracking radar, but no weapons of its own. The other three craft have the missiles and a data link part. That part lets them connect to the tracking radar and remotely target enemy craft. By doing this the opposing aircraft must destroy each launcher or run the gauntlet to destroy the radar station.
